document.full_text: the european central bank raised interest rates for the first time since the 2008 financial crisis on thursday and signaled it was ready to tighten policy further if needed to check rising prices.
document.title: ecb hikes rates, ready to move again if necessary
lines_and_colors: the european central bank raised interest rates for the first time since the 2008 financial crisis on thursday and signaled it was ready to tighten policy further if needed to check rising prices.
